variants.Description in input context: This variant, c.1234A>G (p.Lys411Arg), is predicted to affect mitochondrial function.

Material used.Description: SH-SY5Y cells were cultured under standard conditions.

Readout description.Result Description: Oxygen consumption rate (OCR) was significantly reduced (approximately 60% decrease) in cells expressing the PINK1 variant c.1234A>G compared to control cells.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent experiments were performed, each with cells transduced with different viral vectors.

Technical replicates.Description: Each measurement was performed in triplicate wells.

Basic positive control.Description: Cells transduced with a wild-type PINK1 construct were used as a positive control, demonstrating normal mitochondrial respiration.

Basic negative control.Description: Cells transduced with an empty vector served as a negative control, showing minimal respiration.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: A two-tailed t-test was used to compare OCR between groups.
